column2: an A.M. Eatery////Although it was tight quarters
column3: I have to say that this place was fairly organized.  You have to come earlier than 8:30
column4: otherwise you will wait for more than 2 hours.  We only waited 50 minutes and thank God there are things to do outside and the atmosphere is comfy.  Parking was simple and with it being in the Montrose area
column5: you would think the opposite.  I love the alert system
column6: very up to snuff.  You can pretty much go anywhere within walking distance to pass the time and then you'll get a text.  Better than the buzzers that only have a certain range!!
